remarks: Lemma for ~ toslub and ~ xrsclat .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Feb-2018.)  (Revised by NM, 15-Sep-2018.)
statement:
toslub.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
toslub.l $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
toslub.1 $e |- ( ph -> K e. Toset ) $.
toslub.2 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ B ) $.
toslub.e $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
toslublem $p |- ( ( ph /\ a e. B ) -> ( ( A. b e. A b .<_ a /\ A. c e. B ( A. b e. A b .<_ c -> a .<_ c ) ) <-> ( A. b e. A -. a .< b /\ A. b e. B ( b .< a -> E. d e. A b .< d ) ) ) ) $.
$d .< a b c d $.
$d A a b c d $.
$d B a b c d $.
$d K a b c $.
$d a b c ph $.
